message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to show you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. Would you like to make an offer on it?
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I'm interested, but $9500 is a bit higher than I was hoping for.  I'd be willing to pay $7500 for the product.  What do you think?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. I can see you're interested in the product, so I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer it to you for $8500. What do you think?
